text.tspan: Death rate from indoor air pollution vs. GDP per capita, 2021
Age-standardized death rates from air pollution attributed to the use of indoor solid fuels for cooking & heating,
Indoor air pollution death rate (deaths per 100,000)
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); World Bank (2023)
